definition: see 壓根兒|压根儿[ya4 gen1 r5]
to press/to push down/to keep under (control)/pressure
to break down/to break into pieces/fragmentary

sentences.english: The secondary screens receive the coal from the crushers and remove the fines.
sentences.chinese: 經壓碎後的煤通過第二道篩，篩出細粉。

sentences.english: I hear the song of the nightingales, and I smell crushed mulberries.
sentences.chinese: 我聽見夜鶯的歌聲，我聞到壓碎的桑葚味道。

sentences.english: I hope that the roller crushing, welding machine, I can not suture the sorrow.
sentences.chinese: 壓路機壓碎我的希望，電焊機也不能縫合我的悲傷。

sentences.english: Let the captains of the hosts pierce her with their swords, let them crush her beneath their shields.
sentences.chinese: 讓指揮千軍萬馬的將軍們用劍刺穿她，用盾壓碎她。

sentences.english: A horse was pulling a carload of crushed nuts to a market.
sentences.chinese: 一匹馬當時正在拉着滿滿的一車壓碎了的堅果去市場。

sentences.english: The labels on the cargos are false.
sentences.chinese: 這些包裝袋內的貨物是壓碎的。

sentences.english: The crane crushed the aliens successfully.
sentences.chinese: 起重機成功地壓碎了異形。

sentences.english: The root-ginger should be crushed up before it is added to the boiling jam.
sentences.chinese: 生薑應該壓碎後再加到煮沸的果醬中去。

sentences.english: To make wine, you first crush the grapes.
sentences.chinese: 若要造酒，需先將葡萄壓碎。

sentences.english: Use muddler to lightly press mint and dissolve sugar.
sentences.chinese: 用搗棍輕輕壓碎薄荷，撒上糖。

sentences.english: Please take either of the following methods in disposing capacitors.
sentences.chinese: 在電容器殼體上開孔或將電容器壓碎後焚燒。

sentences.english: To make wine, first you must press the grapes.
sentences.chinese: 制酒時先得把葡萄壓碎取汁。

sentences.english: Incinerate them after crushing capacitors or making a hole on the capacitor body.
sentences.chinese: 在電容器殼體上開孔或將電容器壓碎後焚燒。

sentences.english: CRUSH】Wine is made by crushing grapes.
sentences.chinese: 酒是將葡萄壓碎而製成。

sentences.english: Crush your pills and put them in a jar.
sentences.chinese: 把藥片壓碎放在廣口瓶裏。

sentences.english: The basketful eggs were crushed to pieces by the car.
sentences.chinese: 一籃子雞蛋全被汽車壓碎。
